selected_quotes: Both @ColchesterNHSFT and @IpswichHosp will be smoke free from 8th March. Offering support to patients and staff to quit h…
Misguided sympathy keeps the last vestiges of tobacco acceptability alive in the #NHS
Anyone who thinks smoking shouldn't be allowed anywhere on hospital grounds is severely lacking in compassion.
Please can everyone pass this on an spread the word - A smoke-free NHS
Smoking still persists in our hospitals - why don't we take a stand? #smoking

news.title: Public Health doctor argues for a smoke-free NHS
news.summary: The NHS is not yet smoke free, but it’s time that it was. This is the message of a senior public health doctor, writing in The BMJ* today.
